member.name: T:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.IMismatchAttribute
member.summary:
Public interface of a MismatchAttribute.
All constructors and setters are implemented as internal. The interface only provides read methods.

member.name: P:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.IMismatchAttribute.Name
member.summary: The name of this mismatch attribute.

member.name: P:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.IMismatchAttribute.Suitability
member.summary: The suitability of this mismatch attribute.

member.name: T:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.IPatternDescription
member.summary:
Public interface of a PatternDescription.
All constructors and setters are implemented as internal. The interface only provides read methods.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.IPatternDescription.HasMismatchAttribute(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if this PatternDescription covers the given QoS attribute.
member.param: The name of a QoS attribute.
member.returns: True if this description covers the given attribute. Else false.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.IPatternDescription.GetMismatchAttribute(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the QoSAttribute with the given name. It is assumed that there is only one attribute with the given name.
member.param: The name of the searched QoSAttribute.
member.returns: The QoSAttribute, if it is in the attribute list of this PatternDescription. Else null.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.IPatternDescription.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Checks if two PatternDescriptions instances are equal. To check this name, description and source are checked for equality. qosAttributes and templates are not checked, because it is much more complex and it is assumed that if the first three attributes are equal the whole description is equal.
member.param: A PatternDescription.
member.returns: True if the described attribute of this object equal the attributes of the given object. Else false.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.IPatternDescription.GetPredictionModelByName(System.String)
member.summary: Getter for prediction models.
member.param: The name of the searched prediction model.
member.returns: The searched prediction model or null if there is no prediction model with the given name.

member.name: P:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.IPatternDescription.Name
member.summary: The name of this pattern.

member.name: P:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.IPatternDescription.InterfaceModel
member.summary: The name of the interface model this pattern is able to correct mismatches of.

member.name: P:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.IPatternDescription.Description
member.summary: A description of the pattern.

member.name: P:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.IPatternDescription.Source
member.summary: The source where this pattern has been described first.

member.name: P:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.IPatternDescription.MismatchAttributes
member.summary: A list of mismatches that can be corrected by the use of this pattern.

member.name: P:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.IPatternDescription.AdapterTemplates
member.summary: A list of templates to generate the adapter belonging to this pattern.

member.name: P:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.IPatternDescription.PredictionModels
member.summary: A list of prediction models for this pattern.

member.name: T:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.IPredictionModel
member.summary:
Public interface of a PredictionModel.
All constructors and setters are implemented as internal. The interface only provides read methods.

member.name: P:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.IPredictionModel.Name
member.summary: The name of the prediction model.

member.name: P:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.IPredictionModel.Templates
member.summary: A list of templates belonging to the prediction model.

member.name: T:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.MismatchAttribute
member.summary: A QoSAttribute describes the suitability of a design pattern for solving problems with certain QoS attributes. The class has the attributes name and suitability, where "suitability" describes the suitability of the pattern to solve a problem with the QoS attribute referred to by "name". Suitability is a string which at the moment should have one of the following values: ++, +, 0, -, --

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.MismatchAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructs a new QoSAttribute with the given name.
member.param: The name of the QoSAttribute

member.name: P:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.MismatchAttribute.Name
member.summary: The name of this mismatch attribute.

member.name: P:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.MismatchAttribute.Suitability
member.summary: The suitability of this mismatch attribute.

member.name: T:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.PatternDescription
member.summary: A PatternDescription has a number of attributes to describe all aspects of a design pattern that may be helpful to choose a certain pattern for adaptation.

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.PatternDescription.name
member.summary: The name of the pattern.

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.PatternDescription.interfaceModel
member.summary: The name of the interface model. E.g. Quality, Syntax, ...

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.PatternDescription.description
member.summary: A description of the pattern.

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.PatternDescription.source
member.summary: The source of the pattern. I.e. where it was described first.

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.PatternDescription.mismatches
member.summary: A list of mismatches that can be corrected by the use of this pattern.

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.PatternDescription.adaptorTemplates
member.summary: A list of templates for the adaptor that can be generated for this pattern.

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.PatternDescription.predictionModels
member.summary: A list of prediction models belonging to this pattern.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.PatternDescription.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a new empty PatternDescription.

member.summary: Checks if this PatternDescription covers the given QoS attribute.

member.returns: True if this description covers the given attribute. Else false.

member.summary: Returns the QoSAttribute with the given name. It is assumed that there is only one attribute with the given name.
member.param: The name of the searched QoSAttribute.
member.returns: The QoSAttribute, if it is in the attribute list of this PatternDescription. Else null.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.PatternDescription.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Checks if two PatternDescriptions instances are equal. To check this name, description and source are checked for equality. qosAttributes and templates are not checked, because it is much more complex and it is assumed that if the first three attributes are equal the whole description is equal.
member.param: A PatternDescription.
member.returns: True if the described attribute of this object equal the attributes of the given object. Else false.

member.summary: Adds a QoSattribute to the list of attributes the description holds.
member.param: A new QoSAttribute

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.PatternDescription.AddAdaptorTemplate(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a template to the descriptions list of adapter templates. The filename of the template has to be given as a parameter. By default the templates should available in the same directory as the xml pattern description.
member.param: The filename of the template

member.summary: Adds a prediction model to this pattern description.
member.param: A PredictionModel object.

member.name: T:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.PatternDescriptionParser
member.summary: This class implements a parser for design pattern descriptions in XML. Some parts of the parser were taken from XmlSeffParser.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.PatternDescriptionParser.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructs a new PatternDescriptionParser and parses the given file.
member.param: A string containing a pattern description.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.PatternDescriptionParser.GetValueOfChild(System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator,System.String)
member.summary: This method was copied from XmlSeffParser.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.PatternDescriptionParser.OnValidateError(System.Object,System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventArgs)
member.summary: This method was copied from XmlSeffParser.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.PatternDescriptionParser.XmlValid(System.String)
member.summary: This method was copied from XmlSeffParser.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.PatternDescriptionParser.ParseDescription(System.String)
member.summary: This is the main parsing method. The XML-file containing the pattern description is validated against the DTD and other initialisations are made. After that the methods for parsing the separate parts of the XML-file are called.
member.param: The XML file containing the pattern description
member.returns: A PatternDescription object containing the same information as the given XML file.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.PatternDescriptionParser.ReadGeneralDescription(System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator,Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.PatternDescription)
member.summary: This method parses the general information of the pattern description, including the name, general description and the source of the pattern.
member.param: An XPathNavigator for the parsed XML file
The final PatternDescription object.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.PatternDescriptionParser.ReadMismatches(System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator,Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.PatternDescription)
member.summary: This methods parses the mismatches described in the XML file.
member.param: An XPathNavigator for the parsed XML file
The final PatternDescription object.

members.member:
This methods parses the list of templates needed to created the adapter that can be used to adjust the QoS mismatches of the pattern.
/// An XPathNavigator for the parsed XML file The final PatternDescription object.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.PatternDescriptionParser.ReadPredictionModels(System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator,Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.PatternDescription)
member.summary: This method parses the list of prediction models that can be used to predict the performance of the generated adapter.
member.param: An XPathNavigator for the parsed XML file
The final PatternDescription object.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.PatternDescriptionParser.ReadPredictionModel(System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator)
member.summary: This method parses a single prediction model and returns it as a PredictionModel object.
member.param: XPathNodeIterator that points to the node of the prediction model that shall be parsed.

member.name: P:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.PatternDescriptionParser.Pattern
member.summary: The parsed PatternDescription.

member.name: T:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.PredictionModel
member.summary: Represents a prediction model entry of a pattern description. Contains the name of the model and a list of patterns belonging to the model. The path of the templates is determined by the calling application.

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.PredictionModel.name
member.summary: The name of the prediction model.

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.PredictionModel.templates
member.summary: A list of templates belonging to this prediction model.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.PredictionModel.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructor that takes the name of the prediction model. Templates can be added by using AddTemplate.
member.param: The name of this prediction model.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.PredictionModel.AddTemplate(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a template to this prediction model.
member.param: The name of the new template. The path of the template is determined of the folder structure of the calling application.

member.name: P:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.PredictionModel.Name
member.summary: The name of the prediction model.

member.name: P:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Pattern.PredictionModel.Templates
member.summary: A list of templates belonging to the prediction model.
